articles.title: Aston Villa fans rally around Emi Martinez after emergency Argentina trip
articles.description: The goalkeeper has travelled back to Argentina to be with his family putting his availability at the weekend in doubt.

articles.title: UPDATE 2-Argentine wheat crop estimate increased thanks to recent rains -exchange
articles.description: (Adds details from exchange report, quotes from independent weather analyst)By Hugh Bronstein and Maximilian HeathBUENOS AIRES, Oct 28 (Reuters) - Argentina's 2021/22 wheat crop is expected at 19.8 million tonnes, the Buenos Aires Grains Exchange said in a report on Thursday, citing recent rains as its reason for increasing its previous 19.2 million tonnes estimate.But

articles.title: Aston Villa's Emi Martinez a doubt for West Ham as he travels to Argentina for family emergency
articles.description: Aston Villa's Emiliano Martinez is a doubt for Sunday's game vs West Ham after having to return to Argentina due to a family emergency

articles.title: Navneet Dhaliwal to captain Canada at ICC World Cup Americas Qualifier
articles.description: TORONTO — Navneet Dhaliwal will captain Canada at the ICC Men’s T20 World Cup Americas Qualifier in Antigua from Nov. 7 to 15. The Canadian men will be joined by Argentina, Bahamas, Belize, Bermuda, the Cayman Islands, Panama and the U.S.

articles.title: Real Madrid to upset Dean Smith by beating Villa to Argentina sensation
articles.description: Aston Villa are one of a number of teams reported to be interested in River Plate forward Julian Alvarez - and now another another major player appears to have joined that race.
articles.content:
Aston Villa are one of a number of teams reported to be interested in River Plate forward Julian Alvarez – and now another big side has reportedly joined that race.
Alvarez is in top form this season, having scored 11 goals in 14 games for River Plat... [1844 chars]

articles.title: Lollapalooza Brazil & Argentina 2022: See Lineups
articles.description: Lollapalooza 2022 Brazil and Argentina: Miley Cyrus, Foo Fighters, the Strokes, Doja Cat, A$AP Rocky and Martin Garrix to headline.
articles.content:
Doja Cat, A$AP Rocky, Martin Garrix also top the bill for next March's shows.
